gene_model.description: A model of transcribed DNA. This includes all alternative transcriptions.

variant.description: A sequence variant. Similar to an entry in a VCF file.

chromosome_id.description: A chromosome identifier. Just the name of the chromosome, but different groups tend to use different names. eg. "Chr1" vs. "1".

chromosome_sequence_set.description: A set of chromosome sequences. The attributes of the chromosome_id can be set. eg. FASTA

variant_set.description: A set of sequence variants. The attributes of the chromosome_id can be set. eg. VCF

gene_model_set.description: A set of gene_models. The attributes of the chromosome_id and gene_id can be set. eg. GTF

genomic_interval_set.description: A set of genomic_intervals. The attributes of the chromosome_id can be set. eg. BED
